article.headline: Beyond Meat to launch manufacturing facilities in China
article.body: Beyond Meat Inc. BYND, +0.80% has announced a deal through its subsidiary Beyond Meat (Jiaxing) Food Co., Ltd that will launch manufacturing facilities for its plant-based meat alternative products in China. Through a partnership with Jiaxing Economic & Technological Development Zone (JXEDZ), Beyond Meat will develop two facilities, with full-scale production expected to begin in early 2021. Beyond Meat stock is up 5.3% in Tuesday trading, and has rallied more than 75% for the year to date. The S&P 500 index SPX, +0.87% is up about 4% for 2020 so far.
